direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods create allocation requests but with different attributes. They share similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods create allocation requests but with different parameters and attributes. They handle similar operations but with different details.
Both methods involve creating requests that interact with network resources, albeit for different purposes.
